alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 06 at 6:44PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kings and south central Fresno Counties through 715 PM PST... At 644 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lemoore, or 12 miles west of Hanford, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hanford, Lemoore, Lanare, Armona, Riverdale and Lemoore NAS. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties
